Test ID: Launch the application and check if the main window appears.
Action: "The main window should appear with the title 'Zeytin Editor'."

Test ID: Create a new entity by clicking on '+ Create New Entity' button and name it 'TestEntity'.
Action: "A new entity named 'TestEntity' should appear in the entity list."
"The 'Position' variant should be added to 'TestEntity' and show x and y properties."

Test ID: Set the Position.x value to 100 and Position.y value to 200.
Action: "The Position variant should display x=100 and y=200."

Test ID: Click the 'Play' button to enter play mode.
Action: "The engine should enter play mode and the 'Play' button should turn green."

Test ID: Create a primitive cube entity with Collider variant.
Action: "A new entity with Collider variant should be created successfully."

Test ID: Try to add a non-existent variant 'InvalidVariant'.
Action: "The system should show an error or warning message."

Test ID: Create an entity with a long multi-line description spanning multiple lines to test text formatting.
Action: "The entity should be created successfully with the multi-line description.

Test ID: Add 'Ball' variant to an entity and check if required variants are auto-added.
Action: "Position, Velocity, Collider and Speed variants should be automatically added."

Test ID: Save all entities and check if files are created in the filesystem.
Action: "Entity files should be created in the ../shared/entities/ directory."
